name: Mr. Bubble
storyline: Long long ago...Five Crystals on the mountain after the bubble village...Have already lain where it is! The crystals are protecting the bubble village. Therefore the village is full of happy atmosphere. But happy day is over...The circle of evil spirit, in order to recieve crystlalline power, Snatch the Crystal away from the village!
summary: A game where you blow bubbles into enemies and defeat the enemies by touching those bubbles. It has 3D enviroments and a story cutscene at the beggining. It came bundled with the DVD Disc for the Eee Stick alongside some other games.
